hero.title: Twa Ɔhaw Kwan, Hyehyɛ Wo Ayaresabea Appointment Wɔ Intanɛt So
hero.subtitle: Kɔ Ghana ayaresabea wɔ baabiara. Hyehyɛ appointments wɔ bere a ɛyɛ wo de na nya nkaeɛ a ɛbɛba bere mu.

step1.title: Hwehwɛ & Yi
step1.description: Hu ayaresabea ne department a wopɛ firi yɛn ayaresabea a ɛwɔ Ghana nyinaa.

step2.title: Yi Bere
step2.description: Hwɛ bere a ɛwɔ hɔ na yi deɛ ɛyɛ wo nhyehyɛe.

step3.title: Di mu Dua
step3.description: Nya nteɛso SMS ne email a wo appointment nsɛm wɔ mu.

step4.title: Kɔ Ayaresabea
step4.description: Kyerɛ wo booking number wɔ ayaresabea hɔ ma wɔn gye wo ntɛm. Ɔhaw biara nni hɔ bio!

q1.question: Ɛyɛ dɛn na mɛhyehyɛ appointment?
q1.answer: Klik 'Hyehyɛ Appointment' wɔ wo dashboard, yi ayaresabea, yi department, yi da ne bere a wopɛ, na di wo booking dua.

q2.question: Metumi asesa me appointment bere?
q2.answer: Aane, wubetumi asesa kosi nnɔnhwere 4 ansa na wo appointment bere adu. Kɔ 'Me Appointments' na klik 'Sesa Bere' wɔ appointment a wopɛ asesa no so.

q3.question: Adɛn nti na miannya SMS confirmation?
q3.answer: Hwɛ sɛ wo fon number yɛ pɛ wɔ wo profile mu. Sɛ ɛkɔ so ara a, frɛ yɛn mmoa team.

q4.question: MedlyGo yɛ kwa?
q4.answer: Aane, MedlyGo yɛ kwa koraa. Wotua consultation sika a ɛwɔ ayaresabea hɔ nko.

tickets.noTicketsDesc: Sɛ wode support request kɔ a, ɛbɛba ha
